title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 252.7 - Discretionary review by superintendent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 252.7 - Discretionary review by superintendent

State Regulations

At any time during which a penalty imposed pursuant to a
violation hearing is in effect, the superintendent may reduce the
penalty. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
252.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
